channel.title: [317] Delta Request On How To Right-Click An Orb [317]
channel.description:
I have added my own custom orb, but I need it to give me options when I right-click it. How Can i do this? I really did try a lot(put an hour effort into it) but I cant get it too work. By the way, for people who don't know, when i say orb I'm referring to the circular objects at the top of the gameframe, next to the minimap (were it shows your HP, Prayer Points, all that)
Thanks :D

item.title: [317] Delta Request On How To Right-Click An Orb [317]
item.dc:creator: @www.sagi-x.com www.sagi-x.com
item.description:
@www.sagi-x.com wrote:

Show code, errors, hard to tell the problem with this amount of information. Is your client refactored? Non-refactored?

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Delta Request On How To Right-Click An Orb [317]
